Games.Name: Defender
Games.Overview:
The object of Defender is to score as many points as possible by defending the earth and the humans from wave after wave of evil invaders from outer space. You are in command of the Defender ship with its laser cannon and smart bombs. Although there are many different aliens, the primary attacker is a Lander whose mission is to come to the earth and steal all the humans. If the Lander is successful in abducting a human and taking him to the top of the screen, they are both transformed into a mutant which is faster than a Lander. Watch out! Mutants are both tricky and fast.

If all the humans are stolen, the earth will be destroyed and you will find yourself in outer space fighting fleet after fleet of mutants.

Games.Name: Space Force
Games.Overview:
The Adventure Vision Space Force cartridge is based on the famous Venture Line arcade game and includes all the key features of its big brother.

Your mission is to fly the mother ship through wave after wave of meteor showers launched by the evil alliance powers from the planets Zeral and Xenac. Your job is to blow all alien life forms and meteors to atoms with your phaser cannon, but, you had better be quick in your ability to manuever and fire.

So, plug your cartridge into Adventure Vision, grab the joy stick and get ready for action. For 1 or 2 players.

Games.Name: Super Cobra
Games.Overview:
The Adventure Vision cartridge is based on the famous KONAMI arcade game and includes all the key features and elements of its big brother.

You are the pilot and your chopper awaits full of fuel and armed with sidewinder missiles and bombs. Your mission is to fly your helicopter over 10 different terrains and get the booty at the secret enemy base. It may sound easy but watch out. There are enemy rockets, magnetic space mines, UFO's, and the most treacherous terrain an Ace pilot like you has ever encountered. So plug this cartridge into an Adventure Vision, grab the JOY STICK, and get ready for action.

Games.Name: Turtles
Games.Overview:
This Adventure Vision cartridge is based on the famous Konami arcade game and includes all the key features and elements of its big brother.

It's your job to rescue six little turtlettes and take them home. It may sound easy, but you had better watch out because the beetles are after you. Each floor contains eight mystery squares. Behind six of the squares are those cute little turtlettes. But beware, 'cause the other two contain beetles. If a beetle gets too close you can use a bug bomb, but use them wisely, because you can only use one at a time.

So plug your cartridge into Adventure Vision, grab the joy stick, hit the start button and get ready for action and excitement.
